blog.name: ao3feed-2seok
blog.title: Seok Squared
blog.description: This blog is an AUTOMATED blog that uses an IFTTT algorithm to instantly post fics posted under the relationship: Jung Hoseok | J-Hope/Kim Seokjin | Jin tag on ao3. The owner of this blog (hoseokie-jung) only logs in to delete things that don't belong (rp requests, other ships, etc) once every couple of months because she has a terrible memory and forgets that this is, in fact, her blog.

title: S(e)oul Stories
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2KKyaoq

by iamjustakiddo

The Midnight Diner held many stories. Sometimes that’s where they began, or sometimes they took a strange turn or ended completely. Guests always bringing something new, a soul and heart that could change everything even in the tiniest ways.

-

Seokjin runs a diner that is open from midnight until seven in the morning. Every night he encounters different people, watching them crossing each other’s paths and bringing new stories that tangled together.

Words: 4203, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

Series: Part 4 of Taegiweek2018

  • Fandoms: 방탄소년단 | Bangtan Boys | BTS
  • Rating: General Audiences
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Min Yoongi | Suga, Kim Taehyung | V, Kim Seokjin | Jin, Jung Hoseok | J-Hope
  • Relationships: Kim Taehyung | V/Min Yoongi | Suga, implied 2Seok - Relationship
  • Additional Tags: Midnight Diner AU, Getting to Know Each Other, Seokjin’s POV, POV Outsider, basically Seokjin plays matchmaker for Taegi, taegiweek2018, TG18DAY7


read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2KKyaoq

blog.name: jungkookbaeee
blog.title: Jungkook’s Bae ~ That’s me
blog.description:
~Requests are open~

~use the search button for ‘BTS Masterlist’ :)~

summary:
~Maknae Line 
Genre: Fluff
Words: 1.7k
A/N: Thanks for requesting!❤️
Jimin
13. October 7AM
You were woken up by the sound of...
body:
BTS Reaction: When you forget their birthday

~Maknae Line

Genre: Fluff

Words: 1.7k

A/N: Thanks for requesting!❤️

Jimin

13. October 7AM

You were woken up by the sound of Jimin’s alarm clock, making you grumble in your sleep, turning away from the loud sound. You heard shuffling and the annoying sound finally stopped, making you sigh in satisfaction. The body beside you began shuffling, pulling the blanket away, making goosebumps appear on your skin as the cold air kissed your skin. You began shivering so you tried pulling the blanket out of his grip, without opening your eyes, that were still drowned in sleepiness. Jimin Just chuckled beside you, amused about you trying to pull the blankets.

“Jiminnn.” You whined out his name, making him even more happier. It was his victory to annoy you this morning and it looks like he made a good job. He put the blanket around your form, making you look like a burrito. You didn’t care how you would look like at the moment, you just wanted the warmth spread around your body. You knew you had to wake up, so you slowly opened your eyes, revealing a half naked Jimin in front of you with a grin plastered on his face. You rolled over and gave him a hug while he kissed your forehead. He waited for a few minutes but nothing came out of your mouth, making him confused.

“Babe, wake up.” Said Jimin, snaking your form lightly from one side to another. You just groaned and tuned away from him, making his eyebrows furrow. He continued shaking you and you finally woke up, little bit annoyed that he didn’t let you sleep for a few more minutes.

“Jimin, what do you want?” You asked him, confused about why he was so happy and energetic in the morning. You saw his eyes widen.

“What do you mean, what do I want?” Asked Jimin, trying to figure out if you joke with him or you really forgot his birthday.

You just groaned pulling yourself up, in attempt to go the bathroom and wash up. He followed you close behind and did the same. You noticed the distressed look on his face.

“What’s up with you today?” You asked him patting his hair, trying to sooth his stress but he only pulled away, exiting the bedroom and walking to the kitchen, pouring himself a cup of coffee. You walked up behind him, snaking your arms around his torso, in attempt to calm him down, but the only thing he did was shrug your hands away and continue drinking his coffee. Sadness built inside of you, as you noticed that he didn’t want to talk or have you in his presence anymore.

“Jimin, please talk to me.” You tried but failed as he ignored you. For some minutes you tried speaking to him, but he only looked at you and said nothing. You had enough of all of this.

“Jimin, what the heck, tell me what is wrong!” You said with a little bit louder voice, making him look up at you. You were fuming and he could see that.

“Maybe it’s the fact that you fucking forgot my birthday Y/N!” He said loudly, making you startled.

“No it can’t be.” You said, convincing yourself that you didn’t forgot his birthday and he’s pranking you.

“Well, Look in the calendar!” Said Jimin in a demanding voice. You quickly walked to the hallway, looking at the calendar with it’s marks and circles. And here it was p, 13 October with a heart on it. You looked back at him and noticed that he was looking at you the whole time. You went up to him, hugging him as if your life depends on it.

“I’m so sorry baby, please forgive me, let’s go out for dinner, I’m gonna pay.” You tried convincing him, trying to make him happy for the rest of the day while it’s his birthday.

“Ok, but only if you pay!” Said Jimin with a smirk on his face, making you smile, because all the sadness and anger now changed into happiness.

Taehyung/V

30. December 6PM

Taehyung was usually happy every time so it confused the heck out of you as he ignored you for the whole day. You did everything. You made him breakfast because he was grumpy in the morning. You cuddled with him, knowing he liked to be close to you, but today was different.

He distances himself from you and you tried every time to talk to him. You complimented him, knowing he would blush when you do that, but he didn’t even look at you and continued with his video game, that was suddenly more interesting than your whole presence. You were sad, because never in the whole 3 years you two dated, he ignored you. You climbed onto his lap, making him sigh. You massaged his neck and shoulders but even that didn’t convince him to talk to you. You wondered what made him so upset that he ignored you the whole day.

“Tae,” you tried but he didn’t answered you.

“Tae.” You tried another time.

“Kim Taehyung!” You now said his full name, to which he looked up at you. You were happy that he gave you attention, but his eyes were on you for a few seconds, before he returned them to he game that was displayed on the TV.

“Babe, please talk to me.” You Exclaimed, growing frustrated at the only move of your boyfriend were his fingers that played with the controller. You had enough of this, so you pulled the controller out of his hands and put them behind your back, so he couldn’t reach it.

“Give it back.” Said Taehyung without any emotions.

“Only if you tell me why you’re mad at me!” You said with a pout on your face.

“Nothing.” Said Taehyung looking at the TV.

“No, don’t come here with nothing, tell me what’s wrong!” You whined because all of this was unnecessary. Taehyung’s mouth opened and closed for a few times, when his phone began to rang. He pulled the device out of his pocket but you stayed on his lap, focusing on the call.

“Hey Tae-Hyung! Happy birthday man!” You recognized jungkook’s voice. You immediately stilled as the words came out of his mouth. You couldn’t even hear the conversation. It made all sense now, he was mad at you, because you forgot his birthday. Your thoughts were interrupted as your boyfriend hung up, without looking at you.

You grabbed his chin, forcing him to look at you as you stared at him with sad puppy eyes with a pout. Your lips began to tremble and you tried to hold the whimper that wanted to escape out of your mouth. You were so disappointed in yourself, that you forget your own boyfriend’s boyfriend, as you began to cry in front of him. You never were emotional, so you never cried in front of him, but as he saw you crying because you forgot his birthday made his heart ache. He pulled you into a hug as you sputtered apologies. The sight of you crying made him so sad that he forgot all the anger and madness he had in himself a minute before.

“It’s alright, mistakes can happen.” He reassured you and pulled you even closer to him, so your bodies were pressed to one another.

His shirt was now fully soaked with your tears as you calmed down and looked at him. The look on his face, smiling lightly at you made you smile too, he pulled your face closer, stroking your cheeks that were stained with tears as he brought his lips closer to yours. The rest of the day went on with you and Taehyung playing the video game and falling asleep on each other.

Jungkook

1. September 4PM

The whole day today was weird. You woke up with jungkook beside you, holding you tightly, as he woke up and saw that you were already awake, he smiled at you but his smile quickly disappeared as you didn’t say anything but ‘good morning babe’ to him. After that you made breakfast for him, but he just stayed silent as you tried talking to him.

The next weird thing was, that you wanted to shower and told him that the could join you. You knew every time you suggested showering with him he couldn’t refuse, but today was different. He just shook his head and continued scrolling through Twitter. The whole day went on with jungkook ignoring you. You grew frustrated and asked him every hour what was wrong with him, but he just shrugged and didn’t dare looking at you. The only thing you could do is now, ask his members. Normally it was them to ask you why jungkook would be weird but today it was you who asked them for advice. So you texted Yoongi, one of your best friends.

“Hey yoongs”

“What’s up Y/N!”

“Jungkook is ignoring me and he doesn’t want to talk to me, did he say something to you?” You asked him with frustration in your voice.

The line was silent so you called his name again.

“Y/N, are you serious?” Asked Yoongi with a irritated voice, making you confused.

“What are you talking about?”

“Did you seriously forgot his birthday?!” exclaimed Yoongi as your whole world stopped spinning. You were silent so Yoongi spoke up but you hung up and went to the living room, where jungkook was, sitting, playing overwatch. You went up behind him and wrapped your arms around his shoulders while disappointment grew inside of you.

“Jungkookie.” You said with a quiet voice making it clear that you were in the verge of cringing. He quickly looked up from the computer, to look at you, your now wet cheeks and glassy eyes that didn’t look up at him. Seeing you cry because of him, made him wrap his arms around your frame, pressing your face onto his chest, making his shirt transparent, because of the white shirt and the tears that streamed down onto his shirt.

“I’m so sorry. I’m so dumb. I can’t believe myself.” You said as anger bubbled inside of you. You hated it to disappoint your boyfriend.

Seeing you all worked up he kissed the top of your head multiple times, reassuring you that everything is fine and that it can happen. With you apologizing a few more times, the day continued with you and him laying on the couch, kissing and cuddling.

Ask me anything

You knew you had to wake up, so you slowly opened your eyes, revealing a half naked Jimin in front of you with a grin plastered on his face. You rolled over and gave him a hug while he kissed your forehead. He waited for a few minutes but nothing came out of your mouth, making him confused.

“Babe, wake up.” Said Jimin, snaking your form lightly from one side to another. You just groaned and tuned away from him, making his eyebrows furrow. He continued shaking you and you finally woke up, little bit annoyed that he didn’t let you sleep for a few more minutes.

“Jimin, what do you want?” You asked him, confused about why he was so happy and energetic in the morning. You saw his eyes widen.

“What do you mean, what do I want?” Asked Jimin, trying to figure out if you joke with him or you really forgot his birthday.

You just groaned pulling yourself up, in attempt to go the bathroom and wash up. He followed you close behind and did the same. You noticed the distressed look on his face.

“What’s up with you today?” You asked him patting his hair, trying to sooth his stress but he only pulled away, exiting the bedroom and walking to the kitchen, pouring himself a cup of coffee. You walked up behind him, snaking your arms around his torso, in attempt to calm him down, but the only thing he did was shrug your hands away and continue drinking his coffee. Sadness built inside of you, as you noticed that he didn’t want to talk or have you in his presence anymore.

“Jimin, please talk to me.” You tried but failed as he ignored you. For some minutes you tried speaking to him, but he only looked at you and said nothing. You had enough of all of this.

“Jimin, what the heck, tell me what is wrong!” You said with a little bit louder voice, making him look up at you. You were fuming and he could see that.

“Maybe it’s the fact that you fucking forgot my birthday Y/N!” He said loudly, making you startled.

“No it can’t be.” You said, convincing yourself that you didn’t forgot his birthday and he’s pranking you.

“Well, Look in the calendar!” Said Jimin in a demanding voice. You quickly walked to the hallway, looking at the calendar with it’s marks and circles. And here it was p, 13 October with a heart on it. You looked back at him and noticed that he was looking at you the whole time. You went up to him, hugging him as if your life depends on it.

“I’m so sorry baby, please forgive me, let’s go out for dinner, I’m gonna pay.” You tried convincing him, trying to make him happy for the rest of the day while it’s his birthday.

“Ok, but only if you pay!” Said Jimin with a smirk on his face, making you smile, because all the sadness and anger now changed into happiness.

Taehyung/V

30. December 6PM

Taehyung was usually happy every time so it confused the heck out of you as he ignored you for the whole day. You did everything. You made him breakfast because he was grumpy in the morning. You cuddled with him, knowing he liked to be close to you, but today was different.

He distances himself from you and you tried every time to talk to him. You complimented him, knowing he would blush when you do that, but he didn’t even look at you and continued with his video game, that was suddenly more interesting than your whole presence. You were sad, because never in the whole 3 years you two dated, he ignored you. You climbed onto his lap, making him sigh. You massaged his neck and shoulders but even that didn’t convince him to talk to you. You wondered what made him so upset that he ignored you the whole day.

“Tae,” you tried but he didn’t answered you.

“Tae.” You tried another time.

“Kim Taehyung!” You now said his full name, to which he looked up at you. You were happy that he gave you attention, but his eyes were on you for a few seconds, before he returned them to he game that was displayed on the TV.

“Babe, please talk to me.” You Exclaimed, growing frustrated at the only move of your boyfriend were his fingers that played with the controller. You had enough of this, so you pulled the controller out of his hands and put them behind your back, so he couldn’t reach it.

“Give it back.” Said Taehyung without any emotions.

“Only if you tell me why you’re mad at me!” You said with a pout on your face.

“Nothing.” Said Taehyung looking at the TV.

“No, don’t come here with nothing, tell me what’s wrong!” You whined because all of this was unnecessary. Taehyung’s mouth opened and closed for a few times, when his phone began to rang. He pulled the device out of his pocket but you stayed on his lap, focusing on the call.

“Hey Tae-Hyung! Happy birthday man!” You recognized jungkook’s voice. You immediately stilled as the words came out of his mouth. You couldn’t even hear the conversation. It made all sense now, he was mad at you, because you forgot his birthday. Your thoughts were interrupted as your boyfriend hung up, without looking at you.

You grabbed his chin, forcing him to look at you as you stared at him with sad puppy eyes with a pout. Your lips began to tremble and you tried to hold the whimper that wanted to escape out of your mouth. You were so disappointed in yourself, that you forget your own boyfriend’s boyfriend, as you began to cry in front of him. You never were emotional, so you never cried in front of him, but as he saw you crying because you forgot his birthday made his heart ache. He pulled you into a hug as you sputtered apologies. The sight of you crying made him so sad that he forgot all the anger and madness he had in himself a minute before.

“It’s alright, mistakes can happen.” He reassured you and pulled you even closer to him, so your bodies were pressed to one another.

His shirt was now fully soaked with your tears as you calmed down and looked at him. The look on his face, smiling lightly at you made you smile too, he pulled your face closer, stroking your cheeks that were stained with tears as he brought his lips closer to yours. The rest of the day went on with you and Taehyung playing the video game and falling asleep on each other.

Jungkook

1. September 4PM

The whole day today was weird. You woke up with jungkook beside you, holding you tightly, as he woke up and saw that you were already awake, he smiled at you but his smile quickly disappeared as you didn’t say anything but ‘good morning babe’ to him. After that you made breakfast for him, but he just stayed silent as you tried talking to him.

The next weird thing was, that you wanted to shower and told him that the could join you. You knew every time you suggested showering with him he couldn’t refuse, but today was different. He just shook his head and continued scrolling through Twitter. The whole day went on with jungkook ignoring you. You grew frustrated and asked him every hour what was wrong with him, but he just shrugged and didn’t dare looking at you. The only thing you could do is now, ask his members. Normally it was them to ask you why jungkook would be weird but today it was you who asked them for advice. So you texted Yoongi, one of your best friends.

“Hey yoongs”

“What’s up Y/N!”

“Jungkook is ignoring me and he doesn’t want to talk to me, did he say something to you?” You asked him with frustration in your voice.

The line was silent so you called his name again.

“Y/N, are you serious?” Asked Yoongi with a irritated voice, making you confused.

“What are you talking about?”

“Did you seriously forgot his birthday?!” exclaimed Yoongi as your whole world stopped spinning. You were silent so Yoongi spoke up but you hung up and went to the living room, where jungkook was, sitting, playing overwatch. You went up behind him and wrapped your arms around his shoulders while disappointment grew inside of you.

“Jungkookie.” You said with a quiet voice making it clear that you were in the verge of cringing. He quickly looked up from the computer, to look at you, your now wet cheeks and glassy eyes that didn’t look up at him. Seeing you cry because of him, made him wrap his arms around your frame, pressing your face onto his chest, making his shirt transparent, because of the white shirt and the tears that streamed down onto his shirt.

“I’m so sorry. I’m so dumb. I can’t believe myself.” You said as anger bubbled inside of you. You hated it to disappoint your boyfriend.

Seeing you all worked up he kissed the top of your head multiple times, reassuring you that everything is fine and that it can happen. With you apologizing a few more times, the day continued with you and him laying on the couch, kissing and cuddling.

Ask me anything
trail.content:
BTS Reaction: When you forget their birthday

~Maknae Line

Genre: Fluff

Words: 1.7k

A/N: Thanks for requesting!❤️

Jimin

13. October 7AM

You were woken up by the sound of Jimin’s alarm clock, making you grumble in your sleep, turning away from the loud sound. You heard shuffling and the annoying sound finally stopped, making you sigh in satisfaction. The body beside you began shuffling, pulling the blanket away, making goosebumps appear on your skin as the cold air kissed your skin. You began shivering so you tried pulling the blanket out of his grip, without opening your eyes, that were still drowned in sleepiness. Jimin Just chuckled beside you, amused about you trying to pull the blankets.

“Jiminnn.” You whined out his name, making him even more happier. It was his victory to annoy you this morning and it looks like he made a good job. He put the blanket around your form, making you look like a burrito. You didn’t care how you would look like at the moment, you just wanted the warmth spread around your body. You knew you had to wake up, so you slowly opened your eyes, revealing a half naked Jimin in front of you with a grin plastered on his face. blog.description: | | | | | TWITTER | YOUTUBE | INSTAGRAM |

title: Jungkook and Black women
body:
I so agree with the anon about Jungkook.

Exactly what I would say (the English, deeper-skinned girls, etc). You said you didn’t have enough about him to go on.

  1. The ‘cakegate’ with J Mulan at the Billboard Music Awards.
  2. Mouth agape at Normani at the bbmas.
  3. Follow-up and him staring down Sibley on the red carpet.

 are all something and something is better than nothing.

Also not wanting to let that Army’s hand go at hitouch. But then again these could get accused as reaching, right? My baby is so covert and low key with his. You really got to play close attention to him.

KMBW: It’s clear as day Jungkook has a physical attraction to Black women, even on American Hustle Life you can tell from the way he was with them even years later it’s obvious.

summary: 181130 放不下中文会话 (Can’t Let Go Of Chinese) Ep. 23   [#放不下中文会话#] 非官方亚巡宣传片 #微管独家# #不是救命是啾咪#  [#Can’tLetGoOfChineseConvo#] Unofficial...
caption:
181130 放不下中文会话 (Can’t Let Go Of Chinese) Ep. 23 

[#放不下中文会话#] 非官方亚巡宣传片
#微管独家# #不是救命是啾咪#

[#Can’tLetGoOfChineseConvo#] Unofficial Asia Tour Promotion Video
#WeiboExclusive# #It’sNotJiuMingIt’sJiuMi# *

[Video]:

YG: Jungkook, very soon our Asia Tour will begin right ?  
JK: That’s right, we’ll go soon.
JK: Hong Kong, Taoyuan*.
YG: Although, unfortunately we didn’t have the chance to see everyone in mainland China. 
JK: There should be many people who’d come especially to see us perform right ?  
YG: Yeah, that’s right. 
YG: ARMY’s love really is mighty ! 
YG: Amazing !
JK: We’ll also work hard to deliver a wonderful performance for you guys.
JK: Please look forwards to it loads.
YG: We will continue to use great music and great performances to repay everyone. 
JK: See you then !
YG & JK: Jiu Mi* !

(T/N: Taoyuan is a city in Taiwan. “JiuMing” (救命) means “Help Me” in Chinese, the pronunciation in mandarin Chinese for “JiuMing” (救命) is very similar to the pronunciation of “JiuMi” (啾咪). “JiuMi” (啾咪) is use as a cute expression.)

Trans cr: Nadia @ allforbts
© Please credit when taking out

JK: See you then !
YG & JK: Jiu Mi* !

(T/N: Taoyuan is a city in Taiwan. “JiuMing” (救命) means “Help Me” in Chinese, the pronunciation in mandarin Chinese for “JiuMing” (救命) is very similar to the pronunciation of “JiuMi” (啾咪). “JiuMi” (啾咪) is use as a cute expression.)

Trans cr: Nadia @ allforbts
© Please credit when taking out

trail.content_raw:
181130 放不下中文会话 (Can’t Let Go Of Chinese) Ep. 23 

[#放不下中文会话#] 非官方亚巡宣传片
#微管独家# #不是救命是啾咪#

[#Can’tLetGoOfChineseConvo#] Unofficial Asia Tour Promotion Video
#WeiboExclusive# #It’sNotJiuMingIt’sJiuMi# *

[Video]:

YG: Jungkook, very soon our Asia Tour will begin right ?  
JK: That’s right, we’ll go soon.
JK: Hong Kong, Taoyuan*.
YG: Although, unfortunately we didn’t have the chance to see everyone in mainland China. 
JK: There should be many people who’d come especially to see us perform right ?  
YG: Yeah, that’s right. 
YG: ARMY’s love really is mighty ! 
YG: Amazing !
JK: We’ll also work hard to deliver a wonderful performance for you guys.
JK: Please look forwards to it loads.
YG: We will continue to use great music and great performances to repay everyone. 
JK: See you then !
YG & JK: Jiu Mi* !

(T/N: Taoyuan is a city in Taiwan. “JiuMing” (救命) means “Help Me” in Chinese, the pronunciation in mandarin Chinese for “JiuMing” (救命) is very similar to the pronunciation of “JiuMi” (啾咪). “JiuMi” (啾咪) is use as a cute expression.)

Trans cr: Nadia @ allforbts
© Please credit when taking out
